channel.title: Spawning Npcs
channel.description:
How do I permanently spawn a NPC? I am trying to spawn a banker but everytime I do useing ::npc 494 It goes away after restarting server...
If I add it to autospawn it doesn't spawn at all... any help?

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Still nothing spawning…

my code

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 494 3120 3125 1 3120 3125 3120 3125 1 Admin Island Bank Male Banker
spawn = 494 3122 3125 1 3122 3125 3122 3125 1 Admin Island Bank Male Banker

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 11:38:18 PM[/size][hr]Do you think some file is overwriting it? If so how could I check?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 11:50:16 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind, I got it working! Thanks a lot for the help on figuring it out myself. Thanks for the tips!

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

yes, thats what i said, if you put 0 then they move back and forth from yours to 0, lol. putting -1 might work, it should, but putting the coords will work for sure

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

I don’t want them moving though, so do I use the same coords?

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Replace the " 0 0 0 0 " with the x/y coords, x-y-x-y instead of 0-0-0-0.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Thanks so much! Off to try adding a height to it… then seeing if it works.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 11:25:36 PM[/size][hr]Tryed the height level as 1 and still not spawning any npcs on the coords. :S

here's my code

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 496 3120 3125 1 0 0 0 0 1 Admin Island Bank Male Banker
spawn = 497 3122 3125 1 0 0 0 0 1 Admin Island Bank Male Banker

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Height level is 1 if you’re on the ground, 2 if you’re on the second story, etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs

item.description:
@octavius wrote:

How do I figure height levels?

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning Npcs
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Make sure you’re using the right coordinates and height levels for the autospawn declaration.

Read full topic
